tool_description: Africa-Api is a comprehensive project that provides a vast range of data about Africa, including countries, languages, tourism destinations, colonial history, and much more. This project offers a user-friendly interface that enables users to easily access and retrieve data about different African countries and their respective histories, languages, and cultures.  The Africa-Api project is an invaluable resource for individuals or organizations looking to learn more about the African continent...
title: Africa-Api

api_list.name: tourism[Per Country]
api_list.description:
Returns best tourism locations and categories you can explore in a country in Africa
Takes parameter <country_name>

api_list.name: independence[All Countries]
api_list.description:
If you provide the name of a country as a parameter, the api will return information about its independence date and the country or countries that colonized it.
Takes Parameter: <county_name> with value: <all>
Response example: 
{
"country":"Kenya"
"colonizer":"United Kingdom"
"independence_date":"December 12, 1963"
}

api_list.name: languages [Per Country]
api_list.description:
Returns a json of all languages spoken in a specific country in Africa
Takes parameter <country_name> 
Response example:
{2 items
"other_languages":[12 items
0:
"English"
1:
"Kikuyu"
2:
"Luhya"
3:
"Luo"
4:
"Kalenjin"
5:
"Kamba"
6:
"Meru"
7:
"Embu"
8:
"Maasai"
9:
"Turkana"
10:
"Samburu"
11:
"Somali"
]
"national_language":"Swahili"
}

api_list.name: sizes[All Countries]
api_list.description:
Gets the sizes of all countries in Africa
Takes parameter: <country_name> with value <all>
Response example:
[54 items
0:{3 items
"size":2381741
"unit":"km2"
"country":"Algeria"
}
]

api_list.name: resources[Per Country]
api_list.description:
Gives you a list of the most important resources that an African country relies on to keep their economy running.
Takes parameter <country_name>

api_list.name: countries[AllContries]
api_list.description:
Returns a json of all countries in Africa. Details include: "name":"Algeria"
"latitude", "longitude", "phone_code", "abbreviation", "capital_city"

api_list.name: tourism[AllCountries]
api_list.description: Returns best tourism locations and categories you can explore in each country in Africa

api_list.name: languages[AllCountries]
api_list.description:
Returns a json of all languages spoken in each country in Africa
Takes parameter <country_name> with value <all>
Response example:
{54 items
"Chad":{2 items
"other_languages":[11 items
0:
"Sara"
1:
"Maba"
2:
"Kanembu"
3:
"Kotoko"
4:
"Bagirmi"
5:
"Boulala"
6:
"Gorane"
7:
"Marba"
8:
"Masalit"
9:
"Tama"
10:
"Teda"
]
"national_language":[2 items
0:
"French"
1:
"Arabic"
]
}
]

api_list.name: sizes[PerCountry]
api_list.description:
Gets the size of a specific country.
Takes parameter: <country_name>
Response example:
{
"size":580367
"unit":"km2"
"country":"Kenya"
}

api_list.name: province/state/county[PerCountry]
api_list.description: Returns json for province/state/county in a specific country in Africa

api_list.name: independence[Per Country]
api_list.description:
If you provide the name of a country as a parameter, the api will return information about its independence date and the country or countries that colonized it.
Takes Parameter: <county_name>

api_list.name: resources[AllContries]
api_list.description: Gives you a list of the most important resources that each African country relies on to keep their economy running.

api_list.name: country [Specific Country]
api_list.description:
Returns a json of specific country in Africa eg Kenya. Details include: "name":"Algeria"
"latitude", "longitude", "phone_code", "abbreviation", "capital_city"
